title: Building a Platform Team at a 153-Year-Old Company
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: The digital transformation of Hellmann Worldwide Logistics, as described at PlatformCon 2024, carries lessons other organizations can adapt.
cntitle: 一家拥有 153 年历史的公司如何建立平台团队
cndescription: Hellmann Worldwide Logistics 在 PlatformCon 2024 上所描述的数字化转型，为其他组织提供了可借鉴的经验。
